name: Pygiss
body:
### Introduction

pyGISS is a general Python library.  It is needed for a number of things, including GLINT2.  It was developed by [Robert Fischer](http://www.giss.nasa.gov/staff/rfischer/) (@citibob) at NASA GISS in New York City, and is licensed via the GPL v3.

pyGISS code may be downloaded at this GitHub repository.  pyGISS documentation is found at [this project's Wiki](https://github.com/citibob/pygiss/wiki).

If you are interested in using pyGISS or joining as a committer, please email Robert Fischer <robert.fischer@nasa.gov>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
